评论概述: Thought I might like them — absolutely love
评论详情: Always question buying bottoms online because I’m so iffy when it comes to fabric — this fabric is great. I’m also short (5’3”) and the legs and hanging accessories hang sensibly low beneath my knee when fastened. I went ahead and trimmed the straps shorter. My one thing is that I would describe those straps more as ‘ribbons’, the actual utility of the technical option of ‘hiking up’ the short’s legs is a bit of a question mark for me, as those ‘ribbons’ for straps don’t at all suit the size of the buckles and slip free quite easy. The buckles and chain are relatively GREAT for the price range, actually, which makes the straps lacking extra strange. The chain is fully detachable, which is a massive plus, and is actually extremely handy to have a few of them on hand for styling. I love my pairs and I’ll be getting more ASAP. Staple article — again, “perfect” performance in its price range.
They fit well, the material is nice, and they look good. The only problem I have is the waistband can be a bit abrasive.
Love the side chain  ! The coolest shorts ever

At first I loved these shorts. Super comfortable and my style. After a wash they have shrunk significantly even after initially buying them two sizes bigger. I can still fit in them but they are tight now and just not as comfortable.
These were definitely not my style but the girl who requested them as a birthday gift said she loved them.
I liked these shorts because they are comfy to wear, and the chains are just great. The waistband is perfect, it's not too loose and it fits good just for my waist.

Overall, I’m a thick woman with a big waist and these shorts are a little tight around the waist area. Length wise, they’re perfect. But I’ll be seeing a tailor to adjust the waist for me because the fabric is polyester and there was some loose threading by the inner thigh area.
